InitializeD3D
void CRenderer::InitializeD3D(
HWND 
hwnd,
BBox2 
&
viewport
)

Initializes the server side renderer. Clients should call this method indirectly (via IRenderer::Setup) at application startup.

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

HWND to use for drawing

viewport
BBox2&

viewport to render final viewport into

CreateRendererInternal
CRefObj<IRenderer> CreateRendererInternal(
HWND 
hwnd,
BBox2 
&
viewport,
std::
wstring 
&
shaderFolder,
bool 
startFrozen ,
int 
desktopIndex
)

Creates a renderer

Parameters
hwnd
HWND

window to attach renderer to

viewport
BBox2&

viewport for final render target

shaderFolder
std::wstring&

path to directory containing shaders

startFrozen
bool

should renderer be started in a frozen state?

desktopIndex
int

index indicating which desktop should be used with duplication service (used by Caustic::CreateDesktopTexture())

Returns

Returns the created renderer
